edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.PlanningPoker.views

Class OpenGameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.PlanningPoker.views.OpenGameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class OpenGameView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    An instance of this class is a JPanel containing the GUI for interacting with a planning poker game which is open for voting.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Sam Mailand (sfmailand)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  OpenGameView.LimitedDocument
      This class implements the plain document used to prevent the user from inputing letters and copy-pasting into the manual estimation text field.
      (package private) class  OpenGameView.MyDocumentListener
      This class implements the document listener used for the text field that allows users to manually enter their own estimates.

        game - Game whose card selection values are in question.
        selectedRequirement - Particular requirement whose card selection values are in question.
